edu.uw.spl.exchange

Class NetworkExchangeAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uw.spl.exchange.NetworkExchangeAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.uw.ext.framework.exchange.ExchangeAdapter, edu.uw.ext.framework.exchange.ExchangeListener, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener

    public class NetworkExchangeAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.uw.ext.framework.exchange.ExchangeAdapter
    Provides functionality of the exchange through a network connection

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkExchangeAdapter

        public NetworkExchangeAdapter(edu.uw.ext.framework.exchange.StockExchange exchange,
                              java.lang.String eventIp,
                              int eventPort,
                              int commandPort)
                       throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                              java.net.SocketException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        exchange - the exchange used ot service the network requests
        eventIp - the ipAdress used to propagate price changes
        eventPort - the ip port used to propagate price changes
        commandPort - the ports for listening for commands
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the provided eventIp address cannot be resolved
        java.net.SocketException - if there is an error initiating the socket
